title: LG G5 vs. LG G4: I compared both OLED TVs in a lab, and there's a surprise winner
contentSnippet: Before the G6 releases later this year, we tested LG's two latest flagship OLED TVs to see which is the better buy.
content: Before the G6 releases later this year, we tested LG's two latest flagship OLED TVs to see which is the better buy.
